contents.text: Welcome to Benevity on the Peninsula, where we empower socially conscious brands to make a real difference.
For information about our corporate giving and volunteer programs, press 1.
To speak with a Benevity sales specialist, press 1.
Thank you for your interest. Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a sales specialist to discuss corporate giving and volunteer program options.
I want to speak with a sales specialist about launching a corporate volunteer program to support veterans.
Connect me to a Benevity sales specialist to discuss integrating the CSR API into our corporate giving platform.
I need to speak with someone about setting up a corporate giving and volunteer program for my small company.
I need to speak with a sales specialist about setting up a corporate giving partnership for my student-led physics outreach project.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized platform demo, press 2.
A personalized demo is a great way to see Benevity in action. Please hold while we schedule that for you.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized Benevity platform demo to assess its fit for our company's needs.
I need to schedule a personalized demo of the platform to see how it can manage our veteran outreach initiatives.
Schedule a technical deep-dive demo of the Benevity platform, focusing on custom API workflows.
I’d like to schedule a live walkthrough of the Benevity platform so I can see how it works.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of the Benevity platform to see how it could support our volunteer programs.

contents.text: For customer support or billing questions, press 2.
For technical support and program management assistance, press 1.
Please hold for technical support. A Benevity expert will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get technical assistance with a program integration issue on the Benevity platform.
I’m looking for technical assistance to configure the program management tools for our upcoming veteran volunteer events.
Troubleshoot a 401 authentication error when calling Benevity’s REST API for program management.
I’m having trouble accessing the program management tools online and need technical assistance.
I’m having a technical issue accessing my program management dashboard and need support to resolve it.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Our billing team will assist you momentarily. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Clarify and update billing details on our recent invoice.
I have a question about a recent invoice and need help with billing for our Benevity subscription.
Review and clarify the line-item details and billing cycle for our enterprise subscription invoice.
I have a question about a recent billing statement and need help understanding the charge.
I have questions about my latest invoice and need billing assistance for our account.
